issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard for Windows 7.11.1 + uBO 1.45.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

chrome-extension://cjpalhdlnbpafiamejdnhcphjbkeiagm/dashboard.html#3p-filters.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I figured I should give a quick headsup that the attempt to add whitelistings in AdGuard Base for `/adservice.` currently aren't working entirely correctly, since uBO would sync List-KR from its own extension settings, instead of while the browser GUI is visiting any of the three `$domain=~` domains.

I see two possible fixes:
*My recommended way:* `@@/adservice.txt?_=` (Appears to work correctly in Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List.) + potentially `@@||adservice.io^$~third-party`?
*An alternative way:* `@@||githubusercontent.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||github.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||adservice.io^`

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22780683/203341738-437ba74e-03fa-48d2-a907-ddff4cf666a0.png)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard for Windows 7.11.1 + uBO 1.45.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

chrome-extension://cjpalhdlnbpafiamejdnhcphjbkeiagm/dashboard.html#3p-filters.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I figured I should give a quick headsup that the attempt to add whitelistings in AdGuard Base for `/adservice.` currently aren't working entirely correctly, since uBO would sync List-KR from its own extension settings, instead of while the browser GUI is visiting any of the three `$domain=~` domains.

I see two possible fixes:
*My recommended way:* `@@/adservice.txt?_=` (Appears to work correctly in Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List.) + potentially `@@||adservice.io^$~third-party`?
*An alternative way:* `@@||githubusercontent.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||github.com/*/adservice.` + `@@||adservice.io^`

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22780683/203341738-437ba74e-03fa-48d2-a907-ddff4cf666a0.png)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
